name: SDL
overview:
SDL plc provides global Information Management solutions and related software applications to businesses. Its integrated Web content management, ecommerce, structured content and language technologies, and language services are used for content creation, management, translation, and publishing. The company operates in three segments: Language Services, Language Technologies, and Content Management Technologies. The Language Services segment provides translation services for customerâ€™s multilingual content. The Language Technologies segment engages in the sale of enterprise and desktop technology developed to help automate and manage multilingual assets, as well as offers associated consultancy and other services. The Content Management Technologies segment provides content management technologies to help automate and manage content to deliver an interactive and personalized customer experience, in multiple languages, across Websites, documentation, and channels. The companyâ€™s customers include insurance companies, retailers, electronics companies, food and drink companies, banks, automotive manufacturers, hi-tech companies, and pharmaceutical companies. It has a strategic alliance with SapientNitro to create customer experience solutions through a multichannel communications and marketing platform.

SDL was founded in 1992 and is based in Maidenhead, the United Kingdom.
